caption.p: ( a) SEM images of ( a 1 ) the melamine sponge [ 168] and ( a 2 ) polyurethane sponge [ 132]; reproduced with permission from American Chemical Society and Springer. ( b) SEM images of the pure PUF sponge (the insert is the Al 2O 3/PUF sponge) [ 105]; reproduced with permission from Elsevier. ( c) SEM images of the PDMS sponge (the inserts are photograph of the sponge hydrophobicity and oleophilicity), ( d) the effects of sugar templates on absorption capacity of PDMS sponges with various (the insert is images of the sugar particles with different size) [ 134]; reproduced with permission from American Chemical Society.
